page.title: 18Amateur Theatre Costs
page.content: Cost and committment in the amateur theatre are high. Teams travelling to a Drama Festival like that in Larne will have their expenses paid. This includes royalties, set transport costs, and travel for cast and stage team. The current admission price is Â£1.50, but it is impossible to meet all the expenses of running a Festival from box office receipts alone. Fund raising events such as jumble sales, coffee evenings, garden parties and cake sales are organised by the local committee, and sponsorship from local firms and individuals is sought. The local Arts Advisory Committee makes an annual grant (this year Â£300).
